comment.body:
How do you know Nofish only has 15 followers?

His profile says he is following 15 profiles, but there is no info about how many followers he has.

This tool is probably the best:
https://whoer.net/#extended
I suggest you configure your firewall to prevent leaks. Better than trusting your VPN provider.
@Unanimous: Look below "Interactive detection" in https://whoer.net/#extended and you'll find WebRTC.

@Unanimous: "but I don't use a firewall"

Using a VPN without a firewall is a bad idea. :-)
